problem: 如图,将一块含有30°角的直角三角板的两个顶点放在矩形直尺的一组对边上．如果∠2=60°,那么∠1的度数为()
answer: 解:如图所示,∵△GEF是含30°角的直角三角板,∴∠FGE=30°∵∠2=60°∴∠FHE=∠2=60°,∴∠1=∠FHE-∠G=30°,故选D.
problem_en: As shown in the figure, place the two vertices of a right triangle plate with N_0 angles on a set of opposite sides of the rectangular ruler. If ∠2 = N_1, then the degree of ∠1 is ()
